00020 #include <stdio.h>
00021 #include <stdlib.h>
00022 #include <errno.h>
00023 #include <string.h>
00024 #include <sqlite3.h>
00025 #include "libphonefirewall.h"
00026 
00027 #define ASCII_PERCENT_CHAR 37
00028 
00029 struct Entry *insert_into_list(struct Entry *p_root,
00030                                struct Entry *p_entry)
00031 {
00032         struct Entry *tmp_entry;
00033         if ( NULL == p_root ) {
00034                 if ( NULL == (p_root = (struct Entry *) malloc(sizeof(struct Entry)) ) )
00035                         return NULL;
00036                 p_root->country_code = p_entry->country_code;
00037                 p_root->area_code = p_entry->area_code;
00038                 p_root->number = p_entry->number;
00039                 p_root->name = (char *)calloc(0, strlen(p_entry->name));
00040                 strncpy(p_root->name, p_entry->name, strlen(p_entry->name));
00041                 p_root->reason = p_entry->reason;
00042                 p_root->next = NULL;
00043                 #if DEBUG
00044                 printf("\n\n[DEBUG]: +%d %d %llu - %s - %s\n", p_root->country_code,
00045                                                                p_root->area_code,
00046                                                                p_root->number,
00047                                                                p_root->name,
00048                                                                p_root->reason);
00049                 #endif
00050         } else {
00051                 tmp_entry = p_root;
00052                 while ( tmp_entry->next != NULL )
00053                         tmp_entry = tmp_entry->next;
00054                 if ( NULL == (tmp_entry->next = (struct Entry *) malloc(sizeof(struct Entry)) ) )
00055                         return NULL;
00056                 tmp_entry = tmp_entry->next;
00057                 tmp_entry->country_code = p_entry->country_code;
00058                 tmp_entry->area_code = p_entry->area_code;
00059                 tmp_entry->number = p_entry->number;
00060                 tmp_entry->name = (char *)calloc(0, strlen(p_entry->name));
00061                 strncpy(tmp_entry->name, p_entry->name, strlen(p_entry->name));
00062                 tmp_entry->reason = p_entry->reason;
00063                 tmp_entry->next = NULL;
00064                 #if DEBUG
00065                 printf("[DEBUG]: +%d %d %llu - %s - %s\n", tmp_entry->country_code,
00066                                                            tmp_entry->area_code,
00067                                                            tmp_entry->number,
00068                                                            tmp_entry->name,
00069                                                            tmp_entry->reason);
00070                 #endif
00071         }
00072 
00073         return p_root;
00074 }
00075 
00076 struct Entry *find_entry(sqlite3_stmt *pp_stmt)
00077 {
00078         int num_column;
00079         int count;
00080         char *col_name;
00081         char *col_value;
00082         struct Entry *p_entry = (struct Entry *) malloc(sizeof(struct Entry));
00083 
00084         num_column = sqlite3_column_count(pp_stmt);
00085         col_name = sqlite3_malloc(2 * num_column * sizeof(const char *) + 1);
00086 
00087         for ( count = 0; count < num_column; count++ ) {
00088                 col_name = (char *)sqlite3_column_name(pp_stmt, count);
00089                 col_value = (char *)sqlite3_column_text(pp_stmt, count);
00090                 if ( 0 == strcmp(col_name, TB_PRIORITY) ) {
00091                         p_entry->priority = atoi(col_value);
00092                 } else if ( 0 == strcmp(col_name, TB_COUNTRYCODE) ) {
00093                         p_entry->country_code = atoi(col_value);
00094                 } else if ( 0 == strcmp(col_name, TB_AREACODE) ) {
00095                         p_entry->area_code = atoi(col_value);
00096                 } else if ( 0 == strcmp(col_name, TB_NUMBER) ) {
00097                         p_entry->number = atoll(col_value);
00098                 } else if ( 0 == strcmp(col_name, TB_NAME) ) {
00099                         p_entry->name = calloc(0, strlen(col_value));
00100                         strncpy(p_entry->name, col_value, strlen(col_value));
00101                 } else if ( 0 == strcmp(col_name, TB_REASON) ) {
00102                         p_entry->reason = calloc(0, strlen(col_value));
00103                         /* XXX: String copy seams not to work. */
00104                         //strncpy(p_entry->reason, col_value, strlen(col_value));
00105                         /* TODO: Implement this part or fix the part above. */
00106                         p_entry->reason = NULL;
00107                 }
00108         }
00109         return p_entry;
00110 }
00111 
00112 struct Entry *get_entry_by_name(char *name,
00113                                 int listflag)
00114 {
00115         char *listname = (WHITELIST_FLAG == listflag) ? "whitelist" : "blacklist";
00116 
00117         sqlite3 *db;
00118         char stmt[STMT_SIZE];
00119         sqlite3_stmt *pp_stmt = 0;
00120         const char **p_tail = 0;
00121         int rc;
00122         char logmsg[MAX_LINE_LENGTH];
00123         struct Entry *p_root = NULL;
00124         struct Entry *p_entry = NULL;
00125 
00126         rc = sqlite3_open(DB_FILE, &db);
00127 
00128         if ( rc ) {
00129                 sprintf(logmsg, "Can't open database: %s", sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00130                 ERR_LOG(logmsg);
00131                 sqlite3_close(db);
00132                 return NULL;
00133         }
00134 
00135         sprintf(stmt, "SELECT %1$s, %2$s, %3$s, %4$s, %5$s, %6$s FROM %8$s WHERE %5$s like \'%7$c%9$s%7$c\'", TB_PRIORITY, TB_COUNTRYCODE, TB_AREACODE, TB_NUMBER, TB_NAME, TB_REASON, ASCII_PERCENT_CHAR, listname, name);
00136 
00137         rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, stmt, sizeof(stmt), &pp_stmt, p_tail);
00138 
00139         if ( rc != SQLITE_OK ) {
00140                 sprintf(logmsg, "SQL error: %s", sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00141                 ERR_LOG(logmsg);
00142                 sqlite3_close(db);
00143                 return NULL;
00144         }
00145 
00146         while ( rc != SQLITE_DONE ) {
00147                 rc = sqlite3_step(pp_stmt);
00148                 if ( SQLITE_ROW == rc ) {
00149                         if ( NULL == (p_entry = find_entry(pp_stmt)) ) break;
00150                         if ( NULL == (p_root = insert_into_list(p_root, p_entry)) ) return NULL;
00151                 }
00152         }
00153         free(p_entry);
00154         sqlite3_close(db);
00155         return p_root;
00156 }
00157 
00158 struct Entry *get_entry_by_number(int country_code,
00159                                   int area_code,
00160                                   unsigned long long number,
00161                                   int listflag)
00162 {
00163         char *listname = (WHITELIST_FLAG == listflag) ? "whitelist" : "blacklist";
00164 
00165         sqlite3 *db;
00166         char stmt[STMT_SIZE];
00167         sqlite3_stmt *pp_stmt = 0;
00168         const char **p_tail = 0;
00169         int rc;
00170         char logmsg[MAX_LINE_LENGTH];
00171         struct Entry *p_root = NULL;
00172         struct Entry *p_entry = NULL;
00173 
00174         rc = sqlite3_open(DB_FILE, &db);
00175 
00176         if ( rc ) {
00177                 sprintf(logmsg, "Can't open database: %s", sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00178                 ERR_LOG(logmsg);
00179                 sqlite3_close(db);
00180                 return NULL;
00181         }
00182 
00183         sprintf(stmt, "SELECT %1$s, %2$s, %3$s, %4$s, %5$s, %6$s FROM %8$s WHERE %2$s like \'%7$c%9$d%7$c\' AND %3$s like \'%7$c%10$d%7$c\' AND %4$s like \'%7$c%11$llu%7$c\'", TB_PRIORITY, TB_COUNTRYCODE, TB_AREACODE, TB_NUMBER, TB_NAME, TB_REASON, ASCII_PERCENT_CHAR, listname, country_code, area_code, number);
00184 
00185         rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, stmt, sizeof(stmt), &pp_stmt, p_tail);
00186 
00187         if ( rc != SQLITE_OK ) {
00188                 sprintf(logmsg, "SQL error: %s", sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00189                 ERR_LOG(logmsg);
00190                 sqlite3_close(db);
00191                 return NULL;
00192         }
00193 
00194         while ( rc != SQLITE_DONE ) {
00195                 rc = sqlite3_step(pp_stmt);
00196                 if ( SQLITE_ROW == rc ) {
00197                         if ( NULL == (p_entry = find_entry(pp_stmt)) ) break;
00198                         if ( NULL == (p_root = insert_into_list(p_root, p_entry)) ) return NULL;
00199                 }
00200         }
00201         free(p_entry);
00202         sqlite3_close(db);
00203         return p_root;
00204 }

00206 struct Entry *get_entry_by_reason(char *reason,
00207                                   int listflag)
00208 {

00236                 return NULL;
